import axios from'axios';export var SAVE_USER="SAVE_USER";export var SAVE_MSG="SAVE_MSG";export var SAVE_POSTS="SAVE_POSTS";export var saveResult=function saveResult(res){return{type:SAVE_USER,result:res};};export var saveMsg=function saveMsg(res){return{type:SAVE_MSG,result:res};};export var savePosts=function savePosts(res){return{type:SAVE_POSTS,result:res};};export var findPosts=function findPosts(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/posts").then(function(response){// handle success
dispatch(savePosts(response));}).catch(function(error){// handle error SEND BACK TO LOGIN***
console.log(error);});};};export var storeResult=function storeResult(res){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/user/".concat(res)).then(function(response){// handle success
dispatch(saveResult(response));}).catch(function(error){// handle error SEND BACK TO LOGIN***
console.log(error);});};};export var storeMsg=function storeMsg(res){return function(dispatch){var data={user:res.user,msg:res.msg,icon:res.icon};axios.post("/msg",data).then(function(response){// handle success
console.log("The result in the ajax call is: ".concat(JSON.stringify(response)));dispatch(saveMsg(response));}).catch(function(error){// handle error SEND BACK TO LOGIN***
console.log(error);});};};export var storeReply=function storeReply(res){return function(dispatch){var data={user:res.user,msg:res.msg,icon:res.icon,opId:res.opId};axios.put("/reply",data).then(function(response){// handle success
console.log("The result in the ajax call for REPLY is: ".concat(JSON.stringify(response)));dispatch(saveMsg(response));}).catch(function(error){// handle error SEND BACK TO LOGIN***
console.log(error);});};};
